about_the_game:
"

Breath of Life - The Spelljack (Pathfinder RPG)

Breath of Life: The Spelljack is our second product in the Breath of Life product line. It is a reimagining of a spell-stealing class of the 3.5 edition of a very popular table-top roleplaying system. Like the Vanguard, it is not a copy-paste update. No, this is a whole new class with new mechanics and systems to make it dynamic and fun to use along side other classes available in the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game.
In this book you will get the following:
  • A full 1-20 level class focused on subterfuge and combating casters.
  • 7 archetypes to tailor your spelljack to your playstyle, like the shadow-wielding blackjack or rythmical staccato.
  • 6 archetypes to bring spelljack themes and mechanics and abilities to other classes like grounded spirit for the monk and unchained monk, or witch hunter for the ranger.
  • New spells to aid you in combat.
  • Feats to further enhance your skills.
  • Tricky magic items, adventuring gear and hidden weapons.
  • An example NPC with levels in the class you can use as a guide or as an NPC to interact with your players. 
These options are guaranteed to bring some tactical combat to your table-top battlefield.
"
detailed_description:
"

Breath of Life - The Spelljack (Pathfinder RPG)

Breath of Life: The Spelljack is our second product in the Breath of Life product line. It is a reimagining of a spell-stealing class of the 3.5 edition of a very popular table-top roleplaying system. Like the Vanguard, it is not a copy-paste update. No, this is a whole new class with new mechanics and systems to make it dynamic and fun to use along side other classes available in the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game.
In this book you will get the following:
  • A full 1-20 level class focused on subterfuge and combating casters.
  • 7 archetypes to tailor your spelljack to your playstyle, like the shadow-wielding blackjack or rythmical staccato.
  • 6 archetypes to bring spelljack themes and mechanics and abilities to other classes like grounded spirit for the monk and unchained monk, or witch hunter for the ranger.
  • New spells to aid you in combat.
  • Feats to further enhance your skills.
  • Tricky magic items, adventuring gear and hidden weapons.
  • An example NPC with levels in the class you can use as a guide or as an NPC to interact with your players. 
These options are guaranteed to bring some tactical combat to your table-top battlefield.
"
